text:
@SenRickScott Keeping us safe?  Despite US only constituting 4% of the global population, 25% of the World’s deaths from COVID-19 are Americans!  
US Deaths.       126,141
Global Deaths 505,518
Testing doesn’t cause deaths.  Lack of  WH leadership does!
#DefeatTrump #JoeBiden2020 https://t.co/qzNX9FWiud
